column2: First Minister
Our First Minister is a §Y$NATIONALVALUE$§!\n
First Minister is NOT §Y$NATIONALVALUE$§!.
First Minister is §Y$NATIONALVALUE$§!.
Mandate Duration
Our First Minister can hold office for up to ten years when a new one is appointed. In a dictatorship, however, he can remain in office indefinitely.
§RUnknown
Expert Diplomat\n§gOur leader is an expert in the art of diplomacy.
Successful Industrialist\n§gOur leader is a wealthy industrialist skilled in matters of business and finance.
Ivory Tower Intellectual\n§gOur leader hails from the ranks of the intelligentsia, possessing a superior education.
Man of the People\n§gOur leader is charismatic, and has a way of connecting with our country's people that few understand.
Landed Gentleman\n§gOur leader hails from the ranks of the landed gentry, a man of breeding who is familiar with our country's aristocracy.
Military Man\n§gOur leader has a significant military background, and is familiar with the needs of our armed forces.
Lord Admiral\n§gOur leader has a significant naval background, and is familiar with the needs of our country's navy.
Raving Loon\n§gTo put it politely, we will be fortunate if our leader does not cause the country considerable harm. Many consider him a lunatic.
Luddite\n§gOur leader is no friend of progress and technology, favoring traditionalism over industrial development.
Great Statesman\n§gOur leader is an able speaker and a fine statesman, respected by other world leaders.
Backroom Boy\n§gOur leader hails from the ranks of the bureaucracy, possessing a way of ensuring the country's administration is run smoothly.
Great Reformer\n§gA champion of reform, our leader is seen as someone who can enact significant change in our country.
Gauche Buffoon\n§gFor the love of God, don't let our leader interact with foreign dignitaries. He has, shall we say, a facility for saying the wrong thing at the wrong time.
Administrative Genius\n§gUnder our leader's guidance, the country's bureaucracy has never run more efficiently. Nothing escapes his notice.
Visionary Thinker\n§gOur leader is a true visionary, and under his guidance we shall almost certainly see great leaps in technological progress.
Competent Placeholder\n§gLittle good can be said about our leader. Fortunately, little bad can be said about him as well.
Imperious Autocrat\n§gNo-one challenges our leader, for any reason. That said, he's quite impressive.
Prince of Terror\n§gWoe betide anyone or any nation that gets in the way of our leader's ambition.
Efficient Sociopath\n§gThe country has never run more smoothly than under our leader's guidance. Everyone agrees. Just ask them. They're all nodding and smiling, aren't they?
Pig-Headed Isolationist\n§gOur leader is determined to keep our country isolated, favoring unquestioning adherence to tradition over all else.
Ambitious Union Boss\n§gOur leader hails from the ranks of the blue-collar unions, a man who has worked his way up through the ranks... right to the very top.
Dour Economist\n§gOur leader has a penchant for numbers and economics, even if he isn't particularly good with people.
